SkAi

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

SkAi Study is an innovative EdTech platform offering personalized learning solutions to students across India. With a focus on leveraging artificial intelligence, it delivers tailored content, progress tracking, and interactive learning experiences that enhance academic success for learners of all

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Webflow

INDUSTRY

Education Technology (EdTech)

CHALLENGES

Tackling the Complexities of Personalized Learning

01

Simplifying AI for student engagement

02

Designing for diverse student demographics

03

Ensuring scalability of the platform

04

Maintaining a balance between tech and empathy

SOLUTION

Bridging AI and Education with Thoughtful Design 

We created an intuitive interface that explains AI benefits in a relatable way, ensuring the platform appeals to both tech-savvy and non-tech-savvy users. The design prioritizes clear navigation, scalable structures, and empathetic visuals to connect with learners.

Empowering Learning
Through Intuitive Design

IDENTITY

The UI/UX design features bright, engaging colors, modular layouts, and gamified elements to make learning interactive and enjoyable. A responsive design ensures accessibility across devices, fostering inclusivity.

IMPACT

Amplifying Vergo’s Vision Through Design

The website elevated Vergo’s digital presence, improved product discoverability, and created a seamless, user-friendly platform that effectively communicates the brand’s dedication to ergonomic excellence and modern living.
